Add image paste support
description:
Enable pasting images directly into the chat input for multimodal conversations.

**GitHub Issue:** https://github.com/sugyan/claude-code-webui/issues/155

**Context:** Claude CLI supports image paste on macOS/GitBash but not Linux terminals. The WebUI can fill this gap and provide a better image input experience across all platforms.

**Implementation considerations:**
- Handle paste events in chat input
- Convert pasted images to base64 or upload
- Display image preview before sending
- Support common formats (PNG, JPG, GIF)
- Integrate with Claude SDK's image handling

Fix AskUserQuestion interaction not rendering
description:
When Claude triggers an AskUserQuestion interaction, the permission prompt appears but the actual question/options don't render in the WebUI. This causes the conversation to get stuck in a loop.

**GitHub Issue:** https://github.com/sugyan/claude-code-webui/issues/352

**Steps to reproduce:**
1. Trigger a plan that causes Claude to use AskUserQuestion
2. Give permission when prompted
3. Observe that the question options don't appear

**Expected:** Question options should render and allow user selection.

**Workaround:** Currently requires using CLI with `claude --continue` to recover.

title: Add copy-to-clipboard for messages
description:
Add copy-to-clipboard functionality to chat messages for easy content reuse.

**GitHub Issue:** https://github.com/sugyan/claude-code-webui/issues/25

**Implementation:**
- Hover-triggered copy button on message bubbles
- Position in top-right corner of message
- Use clipboard icon from Heroicons (already installed)
- Show brief 'Copied!' feedback toast
- Fallback for older browsers without Clipboard API

**Accessibility:** ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, screen reader support

title: Enhance tool result message formatting
description:
Improve the display of tool execution results with better structure, status indicators, and content-specific formatting.

**GitHub Issue:** https://github.com/sugyan/claude-code-webui/issues/245

**Enhancements:**
- Status indicators (✅ success, ⚠️ warning, ❌ error)
- Tool-specific formatting:
  - File operations: syntax highlighting, diff display
  - Bash commands: terminal-style formatting
  - Search operations: structured result lists
- Metadata display (duration, file count, line count)
- Smart truncation for large outputs

**Sub-issue of:** #10 (Slack-like chat experience)
